name: Drakeling Labs
detailed_description: Drakeling Labs is the development community for the Drakelings community. This page hosts our technical tests, experimental projects, and any other free projects we're working on that require a Steam account to function (for instance projects that require Steam integrated multiplayer.) If you have feedback on any of our projects, including bug reports, suggestions, or otherwise... please visit our official website to voice your thoughts.
about_the_game: Drakeling Labs is the development community for the Drakelings community. This page hosts our technical tests, experimental projects, and any other free projects we're working on that require a Steam account to function (for instance projects that require Steam integrated multiplayer.) If you have feedback on any of our projects, including bug reports, suggestions, or otherwise... please visit our official website to voice your thoughts.
short_description: Official account for Drakeling Labs project prototypes. Download our free demo to play whatever our latest experiment happens to be.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
